header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Personality traits, spiritual journeys, soul mates, visiting periods in history, imaginary parties
header.activity: Husband and wife having coffee, talking about real and imaginary situations
header.conv_type: Discussing, inquiring, complaining, anecdote telling, making arrangements, apologizing
